Ragnar looked at her with a black glance and muttered in his head.

Ragnar: I'll drag her in a trial of grievance and kill her... I am
Ghost Bear, for Kerensky's sake!

Meanwhile, Blackfang tried to handle the arrival of the tiger lady.

Blackfang: Well, (he looked around at Empath and Windlord) it looks
like I am only part of the commitee. Name's Blackfang. We'll give you
a room and access to a part of our installations, but you will have to
be under constant surveillance. I hope you'll forgive us, but we don't
take Decepticons lightly.
